title: क्या मंदिर के बोर्ड पर लिखा है कि शुद्र मुसलमान का प्रवेश वर्जित है ? जानिये सच

vclaim: Here is how @RahulGandhi's supporter @rajivtango is spreading rumours in @facebook after photoshoping the original one to disturb the harmony of the society…?@Uppolice @DelhiPolice Pls book this person for spreading hate and misinformation..?@CMOfficeUP @rsprasad pic.twitter.com/MYbFdFzTIy
